title: Looking For Duo For Solo Queue
body:
So I'm level 29, been spamming bots, and I'm looking for someone to play with in solo queue, once I hit level 29.

I've decided to play jungle as my main role, and for off role, I'm looking at playing mid / top and support.

Add me in game if you're keen, i'll be spamming pvp from this point forward.

Thanks!

replies.body:
As a piece of advice, if you've only been playing Bots, you're not ready for Ranked. Go in now, and you'll quickly end up in Bronze V with 0 LP and garbage MMR, and then whine on the Boards about ranked being unfair and that you deserve to be a much higher rank.

**1 level's worth of PvP spamming is NOT enough.**

Trust me, get good in PvP (ie Normal Draft) before playing Ranked. You and your future Ranked teammates will be thankful about that.
